children.subject: We'll trust that you will fill out the senior survey next year :]
The survey doesn't have an option for Fall '16 graduates. Do we still need to fill it out to get the tickets?

history.content:
Hello Soon-to-be Graduates!

The L&S CS Commencement tickets are available for pickup! In order to pickup your tickets, you will need the following:
1. Already registered for commencement on our Google Form
2. Already completed the Career Center Destination Survey (it literally takes 5 minutes). 
     * When you complete the survey, they send you a confirmation email.  You can bring a print out of that confirmation with your name on it, or show us the email from your phone/laptop/etc.. Several students who forgot, simply completed the survey on their laptop in my office.
3. You'll complete your graduation card when you receive your tickets.  This is the card the faculty will read your name from; it only takes a moment, and is important for ensuring they pronounce your name correctly when you receive your scroll on stage. 
4. At this time, we can only release 4 tickets per graduate; if you want more than 4 tickets, let us know and we will add your name to the waiting list for additional tickets.  in ~10 days, we will assess how many tickets we still have, and then distribute them in order of request on our list.  If you already requested additional tickets when you registered, great!  We have record of that, but will confirm when you pickup your tickets; there's no need to email an additional request, and we will only add new requests (if you didn't indicate a need during your registration) in person.  
Feel free to pick up tickets at any CS Advisor's office:
Lily Zhang 379 Soda Hall
Christopher Hunn 377 Soda Hall
Charlene Hughes 203 Cory Hall
 
Congratulations on your imminent graduation, and we're excited to see all of you and your families at commencement!
Christopher, Charlene, and Lily
history.subject: L&S CS Commencement tickets are available for pickup!
